titles.title: To provide for a greater number of members on certain combined Farm Service Agency county committees.
To provide for a greater number of members on certain combined Farm Service Agency county committees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

bill.summary: Amends the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to provide for a greater number of members on certain combined Farm Service Agency county committees.
